    PartTimeEmployee - Class in com.mycompany.payrollsystem.staff
     
    PartTimeEmployee(String, int, String, int, String) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.staff.PartTimeEmployee
    Constructor for a partTime employee Takes the below parameters and creates a partTimeEmployee object This is done by calling the default constructor specified in the staff class with name, id, title, scalePoint and password, just as in the fullTimeEmployee's constructor Then payRate is calculated after and added to the object
    PayrollSystem - Class in com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system
    The PayrollSystem class is responsible for handling payroll-related operations including adding pay claims, generating payslips, calculating tax, and saving payslips to a CSV file
    PayrollSystem() - Constructor for class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.PayrollSystem
     
    Payslip - Class in com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system
    Represents a payslip for an employee containing details such as gross pay, tax, net pay, and the pay period.
    Payslip(String, int, double, double, double, String) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.Payslip
    Constructor for payslips Takes the below parameters and creates a payslip obhject
    promoteToNewTitle(String) - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.staff.FullTimeEmployee
    A method used for promoting an employee to a new title Takes the new title the employee will be promoted to as the only parameter Employees default datafield "title" is updated to the new one which is passed in Determines how many years the employee has been at the top scale point for their previous title.
    promoteToNextSalaryScale() - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.user.HR
    Manually promotes a full-time employee to the next salary scale This process involves inputting the employee's ID, authenticating the employee- and selecting a new salary title for promotion
    promoteToNextScalePoint() - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.user.HR
    Manually promotes a part-time employee to the next scale point This process involves inputting the employee's ID and updating their scale point if they are eligible and agree To do so
